Module com.javafx.brick_javafx
Package BrickDestroy.Models

Class RubberBall

java.lang.Object
BrickDestroy.Models.Ball
BrickDestroy.Models.RubberBall
All Implemented Interfaces:
Mobile
public class RubberBall extends Ball
A concrete Rubber ball class that inherits the methods and behaviours from the abstract Ball class.

  • Method Details

    • makeBall

      protected javafx.scene.shape.Circle makeBall(javafx.geometry.Point2D center, int radius)
      An overriding method that creates the ball appearance based on the parameters.
      Specified by:
      makeBall in class Ball
      Parameters:
      center - The center point of the ball to be spawned in the game in (x,y) coordinates format.
      radius - The radius of the ball.
      Returns:
      a circle object that has the (x,y) coordinates and the radius being defined.
